name: China Ceramics Co., Ltd.
description: China Ceramics Co., Ltd. is a premier manufacturer and distributor of ceramic tiles, specializing in high-quality products for residential and commercial use. Established in 1999, the company operates state-of-the-art production facilities in the People's Republic of China, utilizing advanced technology and sustainable practices to innovate in the ceramic industry. CCEC's product line includes a wide variety of ceramic tiles, including floor tiles, wall tiles, and decorative tiles, catering to diverse customer preferences and market demands. The company emphasizes design excellence and durability, ensuring that its products meet international quality standards. China Ceramics is committed to enhancing customer satisfaction through continuous improvement and innovation, focusing on both aesthetic appeal and functionality. In addition to serving the domestic market, CCEC has expanded its reach globally, exporting its products to various countries and establishing a strong international presence. The company's mission is to become a leading player in the global ceramic tile market while promoting sustainable practices and contributing to the development of eco-friendly construction materials.
